sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id : this.props.currentId, data: '' } componentDidMount() { this.setState({id: this.props.currentId}) axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${this.state.id}`) .then((response) => { this.setState({data: response.data}) }) } render() { console.log(this.state.id) return (
